item.title: PI Zombie Minigame. UPDATE 1/28/12 (MORE CODES ADDED!)
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Invalidname, post:106, topic:419953”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=522512.msg3978135#msg3978135 date=1334900286]

Makes me kind of want to make my own zombies game now though i wouldn’t steal yours(DON’T WORRY), as it does suck lol.

wow man thats mean I mean when did I ever say it sucks? :\

is there a way to add this to 667-700+?

If its PI It can be added only thing different would be if your zombie Ids/anims/gfxs are different you’d just need to change them to those.

so it can be only added to pi 667-700 and nothen else? what about matrix?
[/quote]
Lets just put it this way;
If its a PI, it can be added, no matter what it is, 194, 317, 377, 404, 414, 459, 474, 484, 494, 508, 525, 562, 575, 598, 602, 604, 614, 634, 639, 650, and any other revision…[/quote]

alright thanks man… and nice release
[/quote]
no problem

nice release :D
not sure about that one though :|

Read full topic

item.title: PI Zombie Minigame. UPDATE 1/28/12 (MORE CODES ADDED!)
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“BorigTheDwarf, post:98, topic:419953”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=522512.msg3799828#msg3799828 date=1319923931]
[size=24pt]RELEASE THIS ON ANOTHER FUCKING SITE AND I WILL LODGE MY PENIS IN UR EYE SOCKET AND CUM ON YOUR BRAIN.[/size]
inb4alreadyonr-s
Well…

Let me tell you a few things:

  1. Its not done.
  2. To finish, you need to just create a method to kind of cycle the minigame, or make it restart when there are no players in the said zombie game area.
  3. Its horrible
  4. It sucks penis
  5. Gl
    eatmyconventionsbro
    [/quote]

The programming is shit but I love your attitude. A+ for attitude towards teaching, D- for teaching ability keep up the good work![/quote]
D-…
Its passing so its good enough for me!

Thanks for the feedback

Invalidname:

is there a way to add this to 667-700+?

If its PI It can be added only thing different would be if your zombie Ids/anims/gfxs are different you’d just need to change them to those.

Well…

Let me tell you a few things:

  1. Its not done.
  2. To finish, you need to just create a method to kind of cycle the minigame, or make it restart when there are no players in the said zombie game area.
  3. Its horrible
  4. It sucks penis

The programming is shit but I love your attitude. A+ for attitude towards teaching, D- for teaching ability keep up the good work!

item.dc:creator: @hottys2good4 hottys2good4
item.description:
@hottys2good4 wrote:

I added everthing, stated the startNewWave in Server.java, etc. Everything seems to work fine but when the timer hits 0 nothing happens and I get this in the server log:
[2/3/12 6:31 PM]: Exception in thread “Thread-7” [2/3/12 6:31 PM]: java.lang.Arr
ayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3
[2/3/12 6:31 PM]: at server.model.minigames.ZombieWaves.spawnNextWave(Zomb
ieWaves.java:81)
[2/3/12 6:31 PM]: at server.model.minigames.ZombieWaves.startGame(ZombieWa
ves.java:59)
[2/3/12 6:31 PM]: at server.model.minigames.ZombieWaves$1.execute(ZombieWa
ves.java:36)
[2/3/12 6:31 PM]: at server.event.EventContainer.execute(EventContainer.ja
va:70)
[2/3/12 6:31 PM]: at server.event.EventManager.run(EventManager.java:81)
[2/3/12 6:31 PM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

item.title: PI Zombie Minigame. UPDATE 1/28/12 (MORE CODES ADDED!)
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

client.java
import server.model.minigames.ZombieWaves;

under process
if (ZombieWaves.zombieWaveId > 1 && ZombieWaves.inZombieGameCount() < 1) {
ZombieWaves.endGame();
}

and where all other zone things like if u have funpk, barrows, fight pits, pest control are:
} else if (inZombieWait()) {
getPA().walkableInterface(21005);
getPA().sendFrame126(ZombieWaves.waitTimer < 0 ? “Game in progress” : “Next Departure: " + ZombieWaves.waitTimer, 21006);
getPA().sendFrame126(“Players Ready: " + ZombieWaves.inZombieWaitCount(), 21007);
getPA().sendFrame126(””, 21008);
getPA().sendFrame126("", 21009);
} else if (inZombieGame()) {
getPA().walkableInterface(21005);
getPA().sendFrame126(“Wave Number: " + ZombieWaves.zombieWaveId, 21006);
getPA().sendFrame126(“Zombies Left: " + ZombieWaves.zombieAmount, 21007);
getPA().sendFrame126(””, 21008);
getPA().sendFrame126("", 21009);

those are the interfaces
modify if they don’t work on your server/want to change them

in player.java
public boolean inZombieWait() {
return absX >= 2446 && absX <= 2479 && absY >= 4764 && absY <= 4794;
}
public boolean inZombieGame() {
return absX >= 2748 && absX <= 2808 && absY >= 10047 && absY <= 10120;
}

Now set things like names, description, level, size, delays, attacks, aggressiveness by yourself, all you need now for the complete frame of the minigame itself is a way to handle game cycling, like if someone leaves, it cycles correctly, kills off all zombies, no more wave spawning, and will start again when someone goes to zombiewait, good luck.

Read full topic
